description: Returns Admissions Committee by Reference ID, or returns all Admissions Committees                  if no reference ID provided.

Retrieves Student Application Requirement Assignments by reference. For the Request                  Criteria, ALL three of the fields, Academic Person, Engagement Action Item, and Engagement                  Action Item Assignable MUST be entered in order to generate a response. Leaving out                  one of the fields or providing an incorrect combination of the three fields will result                  in an EMPTY response. Please make sure you have the correct Reference IDs when using                  the Request Criteria.
Gets specific Application Groupings if a reference is provided, or the operation returns                  all Application Groupings if none are provided.
Used to retrieve the data associated with an Evaluation View Policy.
Returns Application Evaluation Configuration Rule Sets by Reference ID, or returns                  all Application Evaluation Configuration Rule Sets if no Reference ID is provided.
Retrieves Student External Transcripts.
Returns individual or multiple questionnaires.
Retrieve the configuration for the Recommender Account Creation Page.
Returns Student Applicant Score by Reference ID, or returns all Student Applicant                  Scores if no reference ID provided.
Returns Student Applicant Score Scales by Reference ID, or returns all Student Applicant                  Score Scales if no Reference ID is provided.
The Web Service to retrieve Student Applications with Admission Responses.

Retrieves specified Student Application GPA Assignment values for specified Student                  Application Reference(s). If no Student Application GPAs are provided, gets all Student                  Application GPA Assignment values on the specified Student Application(s).
Returns Student Application GPA Eligibility Rules by Reference ID. Returns all Student                  Application GPA Eligibility Rules if no Reference ID is provided.
Returns Student Application GPAs by Reference ID, or returns all Student Application                  GPAs if no Reference ID is provided.
Gets data about a Student Application or all Student Applications if a reference to                  one is not provided.
Returns Student Applications by Reference ID with Waitlist or Defer Decision Status,                  or returns all Student Applications if no Reference ID is provided.

This process uses a Put-type web service operation to load a large number of Student                  Transcripts. However, instead of loading all Student Transcripts in a single transaction,                  the Import Web Service Process splits up the request into smaller chunks that are                  processed in separate XpressO Jobs.
Imports Student Application Admission Decisions, which renders Admission Decisions                  for Student Applications.

This is a high-volume web service operation for loading a large number of Student                  Applications with Published Admission Decisions of Admit. This import Web Service                  allows changes to Admitted to Program of Study, Anticipated Start, Campus Location,                  and Admitted to GPA for these applications. This Import Web Service Process splits                  the incoming request into smaller chunks that are processed in separate XpressO Jobs.
Imports GPAs for multiple student applications.

This process uses a Put-type web service operation to load a large number of Student                  Applications. However, instead of loading all Student Applications in a single transaction,                  the Import Web Service Process splits up the request into smaller chunks that are                  processed in separate XpressO Jobs.
This is a high-volume web service operation for loading a large number of Student                  Applications with Waitlist or Defer Decision Status.
Creates a new Student Admissions Committee or edits an existing Student Admissions                  Committee with the information supplied in the request.

Updates instance of Student Application Requirement Assignment using the information                  provided in the request. This task only completes existing Student Application Requirement                  Assignments, it does not create them. The element content Academic Person, Engagement                  Action Item Assignable, and Engagement Action Item are not enterable. Entering data                  in these fields will not persist over or change the existing values.

Creates a new Application Grouping with an Academic Unit, Academic Level, and a date                  range. Optionally, deadlines and a size can be specified. If a reference to an existing                  Application Grouping is specified, it will be edited. If none is specified, a new                  Application Grouping will be created.

Creates a new Application Evaluation Configuration Rule Set (or updates an existing                  Application Evaluation Configuration Rule Set) with the information supplied in the                  request.
Puts an Evaluation View Policy.
Creates a new Student External Transcript or edits an existing one.
Create a configuration for the Recommender Account Creation Page.
Creates a new Student Applicant Score for the referenced applications with the information                  supplied in the request.
Creates a new Student Applicant Score Scale (or updates an existing Student Applicant                  Score Scale) with the information supplied in the request.
Uses a Put request to create a new Application or edit an existing application.
The Web Service for Recording Admission Responses for a Student Application that has                  already been Admitted and has a Published Status of Publicly Available.
Creates a new Student Application GPA (or updates an existing Student Application                  GPA) with the information supplied in the request.
Creates a new Student Application GPA Eligibility Rule (or updates an existing Student                  Application GPA Eligibility Rule) with the information supplied in the request.
Creates or updates the Waitlist or Defer Decision Status on an existing Student Application                  with the information supplied in the request.
Initiates the Business Process to change the Admission Response for a Student Application.
Creates a new Change Application Anticipated Start Event with the information supplied                  in the request.
Initiates the Business Process to change the Program of Study on a Student Application.
Withdraws a Student Application and initiates the Withdraw Student Application Business                  Process.
